TextBlock.Text: OKALIS: I've been curious about something, if any of our new neighbors are able to answer. Where do you originate from? Do your people originate from the <color=purple>Bramble</color>, or do you have a record from outside?
AMYLAX: We're honestly not sure. There are some stories of a time before the <color=purple>Bramble</color>, but we're not sure if they're true or not.
KARENIA: Some stories even claim that <color=orange>Shattered Hearth</color> is actually the planet we used to live on outside, until the <color=purple>Bramble</color> tore it apart and swallowed it.
